pkgmetadata.longdescription: **Alastria ID authentication**- Descripción: Librería para poder autenticarse con alastria ID- URL: [https://pypi.org/project/alastria-auth/](https://pypi.org/project/alastria-auth/)- Requisitos: Django- Instalar: alastria-auth==0.0.9- Cómo usar:Añadir en settings.py:```pythonINSTALLED_APPS = [...."alastria_auth.apps.AlastriaAuthConfig"]# ALASTRIA AUTH VARSBACKEND_DOMAIN = os.environ.get("BACKEND_DOMAIN", "http://localhost:8000")NETWORK_SERVICE_HOST = os.environ.get("NETWORK_SERVICE_HOST", "http://host.docker.internal:8001")ISSUER_PRIVATE_KEY = os.environ.get("ISSUER_PRIVATE_KEY", "")ISSUER_PUBLIC_KEY = os.environ.get( "ISSUER_PUBLIC_KEY", "",)ISSUER_ADDRESS = os.environ.get("ISSUER_ADDRESS", "")ALASTRIA_T_NETWORK_ID = os.environ.get("ALASTRIA_T_NETWORK_ID", "redT")ALASTRIA_AUTH_SECRET = os.environ.get("ALASTRIA_AUTH_SECRET", "")ALASTRIA_SERVICE_HOST = os.environ.get("ALASTRIA_SERVICE_HOST", "http://host.docker.internal:5000")#####################```Añadir en [url.py](http://url.py) las urls:```pythonfrom alastria_auth.views import AlastriaAuthView....urlpatterns = [path("alastria/", include("alastria_auth.urls")),....]```
